title: Redesign Dashboard UI with more stylish visual theme

requirements.text: Update the Dashboard page visual design (frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx) to apply a more stylish, modern aesthetic appropriate for a tax consulting firm, including enhanced spacing, typography hierarchy, color accents, card shadows/borders, and visual polish while maintaining all existing functional components (metrics cards, revenue aggregations, task breakdowns, drill-down navigation).

quotes: change the sstyle of dashboard more stylish

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout uses enhanced spacing and visual hierarchy to create a more polished, professional appearance
Metrics cards, revenue tables, and task breakdown sections include refined styling with appropriate shadows, borders, or accent colors
Typography is enhanced with clear size/weight hierarchy for headings, labels, and data values
The visual theme remains consistent with the existing app color palette (warm neutrals, sage green primary, charcoal tones)
All existing Dashboard functionality (drill-down navigation, data aggregations, clickable rows) continues to work without regression
The design maintains responsive behavior on mobile and tablet viewports

constraints: Do not change the Dashboard's functional behavior (data fetching, aggregations, drill-down navigation)
Maintain consistency with the existing app-wide visual theme and color palette
Preserve all existing Dashboard components: metrics summary, revenue by category/subcategory, status breakdown, upcoming/overdue tasks
nonGoals: Adding new Dashboard features or data aggregations
Changing the Dashboard layout structure or component organization
Modifying backend APIs or data models
Redesigning other pages beyond the Dashboard
